VehicleSearchableField.name: VehicleSearchableField
VehicleSearchableField.description: Represents a common dataset including multiple fields and values from multiple objects and is used as the basis for inventory search related to vehicles.

BodyType.description: The body type or style of the vehicle, such as hatchback, SUV, or coupe.

BusinessBrandId.description: Lookup to the Business Brand related to a vehicle model.

BusinessBrandName.description: The name of the business brand related to a vehicle model.

CurrentOwnerAccountId.description: Lookup to an Account record that's the current owner of a vehicle.

CurrentOwnerName.description: The name of the current owner of a vehicle.

DealerAccountId.description: Lookup to an Account record related to the dealer of a vehicle.

DealerName.description: The name of the dealer account related to a vehicle.

DoorCount.description: The number of doors in the vehicle model, such as 2 or 4.

DoorStyleType.description: The style of doors in the vehicle model, such as wing doors, swing-up doors, or switchblade doors.

EmissionStandard.description: The emission standard applicable to the vehicle, such as EURO 5, or LEV.

EngineCubicCapacity.description: The engine capacity of the vehicle model, such as 1900 cc.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of a vehicle.

FuelType.description: The power source used in the vehicle such as Gasoline, CNG, Hybrid, Battery, or Diesel.

GearBoxType.description: The type of gear box in a vehicle, such as AMT or CVT.

GeoCountryId.description: Lookup to the Geo Country code associated with the specific vehicle model.

GeoCountryName.description: The country associated with the specific vehicle model and variant.

InventoryLocationCoordinates.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates of an inventory location for a vehicle.

InventoryLocationCoordinatesLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of an inventory location. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

InventoryLocationCoordinatesLongitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of an inventory location. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

InventoryLocationId.description: Lookup to a Location record related to the product item for a vehicle.

InventoryLocationName.description: The name of an inventory location for a vehicle.

InventoryLocationType.description: The type of an inventory location for a vehicle.

IsProductSerialized.description: Indicates whether the product is serialized (true), or not (false).

IsRecallOpen.description: Indicates whether a vehicle is open for recall (true) or not (false).

LastOdometerReading.description: The latest odometer reading for a vehicle.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

MainBatteryType.description: The type of battery used in the vehicle, such as Lithium Ion, or gel cell battery (Dry Cell).

MakeName.description: The make name of a vehicle.

ManufacturedDate.description: The date on which a vehicle is manufactured.

MarketPrice.description: The market price of a vehicle.

ModelName.description: The model name of a vehicle.

ModelYear.description: The model year of a vehicle.

Name.description: The system-defined name of the VehicleSearchableField record.

OdometerStatus.description: The status of a vehicle's odometer, such as new or tampered.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the VehicleSearchableField record.

ParentInventoryLocationId.description: Lookup to the parent inventory location for a vehicle.

ParentInventoryLocationName.description: The name of the parent inventory location for a vehicle.

ParentInventoryLocationType.description: The type of the parent inventory location for a vehicle.

ProductCode.description: The unique code of a Product record related to the vehicle model.

ProductFamily.description: The product family to which a vehicle belongs.

ProductId.description: Lookup to a Product record related to a vehicle.

ProductImageUrl.description: The URL to the image of a product. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

ProductItemId.description: Lookup to a Product Item record where the product is related to a vehicle model.

ProductItemName.description: The name of the product item that tracks the location of a specific vehicle.

RegistrationRegionCode.description: The unique identification code of the area or region where the vehicle was registered, such as CA or DL.

SerializedProductId.description: Lookup to the Serialized Product record related to a vehicle.

SerializedProductName.description: The name of the serialized product related to a vehicle.

SteeringType.description: The type of steering in a vehicle, such as hydraulic or electric.

TopSpeed.description: The highest speed the vehicle model can achieve.

TotalQuantityAtLocation.description: The total quantity of product items at a specific inventory location for a vehicle.

TotalQuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used for the total quantity of product items.

TransmissionType.description: The transmission type of the vehicle, such as manual or automatic.

TrimType.description: The trim type of the vehicle model, such as DX, GT,or LS.

UniversalProductCode.description: The universal product code used to track the parts used in the vehicle.

VariantName.description: The variant name associated with the vehicle model.

VehicleClassification.description: The classification or category of the vehicle such as sport, utility, or sedan.

VehicleConditionType.description: The condition type of a vehicle, such as new, running, or faulty.

VehicleCurrentLocation.description: The current address of a vehicle.

VehicleCurrentLocationCity.description: The city specified in the current address of a vehicle.

VehicleCurrentLocationCountry.description: The country specified in the current address of a vehicle.

VehicleCurrentLocationGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the vehicle’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

VehicleCurrentLocationLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the vehicle. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

VehicleCurrentLocationLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the vehicle. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

VehicleCurrentLocationPostalCode.description: The postal code where the vehicle is located.

VehicleCurrentLocationState.description: The state where the vehicle is located.

VehicleCurrentLocationStreet.description: The street where the vehicle is located.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: Lookup to a Vehicle Definition record.

VehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identification number of a vehicle.

VehicleProductName.description: The name of the vehicle definition related to a vehicle.

VehicleRegistrationNumber.description: The registration number of a vehicle.

VehicleStatus.description: The status of a vehicle, such as in repair or in dealer lot.

VehicleStockCode.description: The unique code assigned to a vehicle to keep track of the inventory.
